```{r first_chunk_delivery, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)


mb_to_bytes<-1048576

folder_path <- "/home/kadir/Desktop/ida-gossip-experiments/classic_gossip_1psend/"

target_variable <- as.name("MessageSize")
x_label="Message Size (MB)"

df_chunks <- read.csv(paste(folder_path, "first_chunk_delivery_df.tsv", sep = ""), sep = "\t", header = TRUE)
df_chunks$MessageSize = df_chunks$MessageSize / mb_to_bytes


p1 <- ggplot(df_chunks, aes(x= as.factor(!!target_variable), y=Median, group=MessageChunkCount, color=as.factor(MessageChunkCount))) +
      geom_line()+
      geom_point()+
      labs(x=x_label, y="First Chunk Delivery Time(ms)",  color='Chunk Count') +
      expand_limits(y = 0) + 
      theme(legend.position="top")



```


```{r message_delivery, echo=FALSE}

df_message_delivery <- read.csv(paste(folder_path, "message_received_df.tsv", sep = ""), sep = "\t", header = TRUE)
df_message_delivery$MessageSize = df_message_delivery$MessageSize / mb_to_bytes



```


```{r, echo=FALSE,  fig.width=3.5, fig.height=4.5, eval=TRUE}

#https://waterdata.usgs.gov/blog/beyond-basic-plotting/

names(df_chunks)[names(df_chunks) == 'MessageChunkCount'] <- "ChunkCount"
names(df_message_delivery)[names(df_message_delivery) == 'MessageChunkCount'] <- "ChunkCount"
names(df_network_usage)[names(df_network_usage) == 'MessageChunkCount'] <- "ChunkCount"

#FirstQuartile ThirdQuartile

df_chunks <- df_chunks %>% select( !!target_variable, ChunkCount, Median,FirstQuartile,ThirdQuartile) %>% rename( ChunkDelivery = Median)
df_message_delivery <- df_message_delivery  %>% select( !!target_variable, ChunkCount, Median,FirstQuartile,ThirdQuartile) %>% rename( MessageDelivery = Median)
df_network_usage <- df_network_usage  %>% select( !!target_variable, ChunkCount, Median,FirstQuartile,ThirdQuartile) %>% rename( NetworkUsage = Median)


df_chunks <- df_chunks %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 1, "Classic Gossip"))
df_chunks <- df_chunks %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 128, "IDA-Gossip"))

df_message_delivery <- df_message_delivery %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 1, "Classic Gossip"))
df_message_delivery <- df_message_delivery %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 128, "IDA-Gossip"))

df_network_usage <- df_network_usage %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 1, "Classic Gossip"))
df_network_usage <- df_network_usage %>% mutate(ChunkCount = replace(ChunkCount, ChunkCount == 128, "IDA-Gossip"))

library(reshape)

df_chunks.melted <- melt(df_chunks, id=c("MessageSize","ChunkCount", "FirstQuartile", "ThirdQuartile"))
df_message_delivery.melted <- melt(df_message_delivery, id=c("MessageSize","ChunkCount", "FirstQuartile", "ThirdQuartile"))
df_network_usage.melted <- melt(df_network_usage, id=c("MessageSize","ChunkCount", "FirstQuartile", "ThirdQuartile"))
 
merged_df <- rbind( df_chunks.melted, df_message_delivery.melted )
merged_df <- rbind( merged_df, df_network_usage.melted )

#merged_df <- rbind( df_message_delivery.melted, df_network_usage.melted )
#merged_df <- rbind( merged_df, df_chunks.melted)

p <- ggplot(merged_df, aes(x= as.factor(!!target_variable), y=value,  group=ChunkCount, color=as.factor(ChunkCount), linetype=as.factor(ChunkCount), shape=as.factor(ChunkCount) )) +
      geom_line()+
      geom_point()+
      geom_errorbar( aes(ymin=FirstQuartile, ymax=ThirdQuartile), width=0.1, alpha=1, size=0.2)+
      expand_limits(y = 0) +
      labs(color='Type', shape='Type', linetype='Type') +
      theme_bw()+
      theme(legend.position="top") +
      ylab(NULL) +
      xlab(x_label) +
      theme(strip.background = element_blank(), strip.placement = "outside", legend.margin=margin(0, 0, -6, 0) )

#, switch = "y"
p <- p + facet_grid(variable ~ ., scales = "free_y", switch = "y", labeller = as_labeller(
      c(ChunkDelivery = "First Chunk Latency (S)", MessageDelivery = "Latency (S)", NetworkUsage = "Uploaded Data (MB)"))
  ) + theme(plot.margin = margin(0,0.5,0,0, "cm")) + scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) format(x, scientific = FALSE)) #+ scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) format(x, scientific = TRUE)) 

p <- p + theme(text = element_text(family="Times", face="plain", size=8), strip.text.y=element_text(family="Times", face="plain", size=8))


p

ggsave("classic-vs-ida.pdf", p)


```
